name: Rope Escape Atlantis
description:
Rope Escape Atlantis is here!!!

Longer and faster, Rope Escape Atlantis will take you and your pet to a race against time.
Escape the crumbling city of Atlantis, finding the last standing pillar to keep you out of the water
Sounds challenging? Add some meteor showers, lightning, explosions, lakes of lava and you got yourself "Rope Escape Atlantis"!

Key Features:

•Multiply your score by leveling up and complete tasks

•Choose your character

•Choose the pet that will assist you

•5 crazy worlds

•See your friends achievements and beat them
